summary: Did you know that GAO saved $77.6 billion for taxpayers in FY 2020? That's a return of about $114 for every dollar of our budget. We did it by recommending ways to prevent payment errors, improve the efficiency and effectiveness of federal programs, and prevent fraud. We also identified 1,332 other benefits—things that improve programs and operations but can't be measured in dollars. For example...
title: Performance and Accountability Report Fiscal Year 2020
